Class GameDbContext

Namespace
GamePlayService.Data

GamePlayService.dll

Represents the database context for the chess game, handling game records and moves.

public class GameDbContext : DbContext, IInfrastructure<IServiceProvider>, IDbContextDependencies, IDbSetCache, IDbContextPoolable, IResettableService, IDisposable, IAsyncDisposable
